title: Software Engineering Manager, BT
summary: Leading a team of software engineers compromising of three squads delivering React, Java API and Flutter to deliver a Basket and Checkout platform for EE's new Marketplace platform.
highlights: Leading a team of over 30 Software Engineers from across the globe
Working with React, Flutter and Java Spring Boot
Developing Roadmaps and coordintating with Product Owners
Building Frameworks for delivering high quality
Using Agile Methedologies and DORA metrics
Conducting Code Reviews and Quality Assurance
Improving Code Coverage, and Test-Driven Development

title: Azure Cloud Consultant, BT
summary: Developing Azure Cloud IT Solutions for various BT customers, with a particular focus on Power Platform and Microsoft Teams.
highlights: Designing and Devloping Microsoft Teams Solutions and Policies
Mentoring Graduates and Apprentices in Microsoft technologies
Business Case curation and Project management
